/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban scene below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to bathe the scene in light as day turns to night. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the rhythm and energy of the city.
